title: Create modern logo for The Bharat PDF

requirements.text: Generate a modern, clean logo image for 'The Bharat PDF' with green as the primary color, white/light background support, minimal SaaS style, incorporating a simple PDF/document/file icon element, using a smooth modern font with flat design (no heavy gradients), optimized for header display at desktop and mobile sizes

quotes: Design a modern, clean, and professional logo for the website
Match the website's existing green & white theme
Use a minimal SaaS style (like PDF tools websites)
Include a simple icon related to: PDF / document / file

acceptanceCriteria: Logo displays 'The Bharat PDF' text clearly
Primary color is green matching the existing theme
Design is minimal and professional in SaaS style
Includes a simple PDF/document/file icon element
Uses a smooth, modern font
Flat design without heavy gradients
Looks good on white or light backgrounds
Suitable for both desktop and mobile header display

requirements.text: Generate a favicon version of The Bharat PDF logo optimized for small sizes (16x16, 32x32, 48x48 pixels) with the same green theme and recognizable PDF/document icon element

quotes: Ensure it looks good on: Header (desktop & mobile), Favicon (small size)

acceptanceCriteria: Favicon is recognizable at small sizes (16x16, 32x32, 48x48)
Maintains green color theme
Icon element is clear and identifiable
Works on both light and dark browser UI backgrounds

requirements.text: Update the Navbar component to display the new logo image in place of the current text-based branding, ensuring it blends perfectly with the existing UI without modifying any layout, functionality, or navigation structure

quotes: Only create and apply new logo
Ensure logo blends perfectly with current UI
❌ Do NOT change any website layout or features

acceptanceCriteria: Logo image replaces text branding in Navbar
Logo scales appropriately for desktop and mobile viewports
No changes to navigation links, menu structure, or functionality
Logo maintains proper spacing and alignment with existing elements
Green theme consistency is preserved

requirements.text: Update frontend/index.html to reference the new favicon files, replacing any existing favicon references without modifying other meta tags or HTML structure

quotes: Ensure it looks good on: Header (desktop & mobile), Favicon (small size)
Only create and apply new logo

acceptanceCriteria: Favicon link tags point to new favicon files
Multiple favicon sizes are referenced (16x16, 32x32, 48x48 or equivalent)
No changes to page title, meta tags, or other HTML elements
Favicon displays correctly in browser tabs

constraints: Do not change any website layout or features
Do not modify functionality or navigation structure
Only create and apply the new logo
Logo must blend perfectly with current UI
Preserve existing green and white color theme
Maintain current Navbar component structure and behavior
nonGoals: Modifying color scheme beyond the logo
Updating branding in components other than Navbar and favicon

required: Modern, clean logo for 'The Bharat PDF' with green primary color on transparent/white background, minimal SaaS style, incorporating a simple PDF document icon, smooth modern sans-serif font, flat design without gradients, horizontal layout suitable for website header (logo-header.dim_400x80.png)
Favicon version of The Bharat PDF logo optimized for small display, simple PDF document icon in green, recognizable at tiny sizes, square format (favicon.dim_48x48.png)
